sammukha parikshanayak atharathura oben asiya haki prashna ❑ ayi mema rakiyawata ayadum kale? ❑ wisheshayenma mema aayathanaye rakiyawak kirimata obata awashya wanne ayi? ❑ mema rakiyawa/aayathanaya/karmanthaya gana oba danna thorathuru monawada? ❑ mewani rakiya kalin kara thibenawada? ❑ mona wage yanthra hasuruwanna puluwanda? ❑ mema kshethraye yam addakim obata thibenawada? ❑ mema rakiyawata prayojanawath wana hakiyawan obata thibenawada? ❑ oba gana yamak pawasanna. ❑ oba gana hondinma wisthara kirimata yodagatha haki wachana paha monawada? ❑ adhika wada obata daraganna puluwanda? ❑ kalin rakiyawen oba ayin wune ayi? ❑ mechchara kal rakiyawak nathuwa hitiye ayi? ❑ obe kalin aayathanaya oba gana daranne mona wage adahasakda? ❑ kalin rakiyawedi danum nodi rakiyawata nogos sitiye ki wathawakda? ❑ obe anagatha balaporoththu monawada? ❑ rakiyawa bharaganna puluwan kawada indanda? ❑ obe dakshathawan monawada?
